sentence_zh_TW: 這場運動旨在提高人們對環保的意識，鼓勵所有人參與保護我們的地球。
sentence: This ______ aims to raise awareness about environmental protection and encourages everyone to participate in safeguarding our planet.

sentence_zh_TW: 在即將到來的選舉中，市民將投票選出最合適的候選人來代表他們的利益。
sentence: In the upcoming election, citizens will vote to elect the most suitable ______ to represent their interests.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位老人的手杖幫助他走路，並給予他在行走時所需的額外支持。
sentence: The elderly man's ______ helps him walk and provides the extra support he needs while moving.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們計劃在湖上劃獨木舟，這將是一個放鬆身心的絕佳方式。
sentence: We plan to paddle a ______ on the lake, which will be a wonderful way to relax and unwind.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個容器的容量足以滿足家裡所有成員的需求，無論是在儲存食物還是飲料方面。
sentence: The ______ of this container is enough to meet the needs of all family members, whether in storing food or beverages.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個市場中，企業必須適應不斷變化的需求，以留住忠實的消費者。
sentence: In this market, businesses must adapt to the ever-changing demands to retain loyal ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了確保食品的新鮮，使用合適的容器來儲存和保持產品是非常重要的。
sentence: To ensure the freshness of food, it is very important to use the right ______ to store and preserve products.

sentence_zh_TW: 這本書的主要內容深入探討了人類的道德哲學以及我們的道德選擇。
sentence: The main ______ of this book delves deeply into human moral philosophy and our moral choices.

sentence_zh_TW: 真正的滿足並不是來自於物質擁有，而是來自於內心的平靜與安寧。
sentence: True ______ does not come from material possessions, but rather from inner peace and tranquility.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這次比賽中，參賽者們展示了他們的才華和對這一藝術形式的熱愛。
sentence: In this ______, the contestants showcased their skills and passion for this art form.

sentence_zh_TW: 理解歷史事件的背景對於評估其影響和重要性至關重要。
sentence: Understanding the ______ of historical events is crucial for assessing their impact and significance.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這項研究中，持續的監測被發現是獲得準確數據的重要因素。
sentence: In this study, ______ monitoring was found to be a crucial factor for obtaining accurate data.

sentence_zh_TW: 科學界對這個現象的持續觀察，使我們對這一問題的理解更加深入。
sentence: The ______ observation of this phenomenon by the scientific community has enhanced our understanding of the issue.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多科學研究的結果常常顯示出與我們的直覺相反的結論。
sentence: Many scientific studies often show conclusions that are ______ to our intuitions.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這篇文章中，作者利用對比來強調不同文化之間的差異。
sentence: In this article, the author uses ______ to highlight the differences between various cultures.

sentence_zh_TW: 所有團隊成員都應該明白，自己的努力如何貢獻於整個項目的成功。
sentence: All team members should understand how their efforts ______ to the success of the entire project.

sentence_zh_TW: 他的研究對於科學社區的貢獻將長期受到重視，並影響未來的研究方向。
sentence: His ______ to the scientific community will be valued for a long time and will influence future research directions.

sentence_zh_TW: 在實驗室中，科學家使用計數器來精確測量反應物質的數量。
sentence: In the laboratory, scientists use a ______ to precisely measure the amount of reactants.

sentence_zh_TW: 在危險的情況下，那名勇敢的消防員沒有猶豫，迅速進入火場救出被困者。
sentence: In a dangerous situation, the ______ firefighter did not hesitate to rush into the flames to rescue the trapped people.

sentence_zh_TW: 在商業交往中，表現出的禮貌可以有效促進良好的人際關係。
sentence: In business dealings, displaying ______ can significantly enhance good inter-personal relationships.
